text: Burnaby is a city in the Canadian province of British Columbia. The population of Burnaby was 249,125 in 2021. The mayor of Burnaby is Mike Hurley. The city was named after Robert Burnaby, a legislator, speaker, Freemason and explorer. The largest commercial mall in British Columbia, is Metropolis at Metrotown is located in Burnaby. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1892 establishments in Canada Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:Settlements in Greater Vancouver
title: Burnaby
